tit.cmt: 京都市 を追加しました。

sen.j: 北区（きたく）は、京都市を構成する11区のひとつである。
sen.e: Kita Ward is one of the 11 Wards that constitutes Kyoto City.
Kita Ward is one of the 11 Wards that constitutes Kyoto City.
Kita Ward is one of the eleven wards that constitutes Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 住宅地を中心とした平野部と、北部の山間地で構成される。
sen.e: It consists of a plain mainly for residential areas and northern mountainous areas.
It consists of a plain mainly for residential areas and northern mountainous areas.
It consists of a plain mainly for residential areas and northern mountainous areas.

sen.j: 区内には鹿苑寺や大徳寺、上賀茂神社といった洛北の寺社のほか、立命館大学、佛教大学、大谷大学、京都産業大学などいくつかの大学がある。
sen.e: There are Rokuon-ji Temple, Daitoku-ji Temple, Kamigamo-jinja Shrine, and other shrines and temples in Rakuhoku, and several universities such as Ritsumeikan University, Bukkyo University, Otani University, and Kyoto Sangyo University.

There are Rokuon-ji Temple, Daitoku-ji Temple, Kamigamo-jinja Shrine, and other shrines and temples in Rakuhoku, and several universities such as Ritsumeikan University, Bukkyo University, Otani University, and Kyoto Sangyo University.

There are temples and shrines in Rakuhoku (north of the Capital of Kyoto) area such as Rokuon-ji Temple, Daitoku-ji Temple and Kamigamo-jinja Shrine, and several universities such as Ritsumeikan University, Bukkyo University, Otani University, and Kyoto Sangyo University.
sen.cmt: 洛北 の補足をしました。

sen.j: 北大路駅付近と北野白梅町駅付近に商業施設が多い。
sen.e: Many commercial facilities are found around Kitaoji Station and Kitano Hakubaicho Station.
Many commercial facilities are found around Kitaoji Station and Kitano Hakubaicho Station.
Many commercial facilities are found around Kitaoji Station and Kitano Hakubaicho Station.

sen.j: 1955年（昭和30年） 9月1日 上京区から分区して誕生
sen.e: On September 1, 1955, Kita Ward was divided from Kamigyo Ward to be established as a ward.
On September 1, 1955, Kita Ward was divided from Kamigyo Ward to be established as a ward.
On September 1, 1955, Kita Ward was divided from Kamigyo Ward to be established as a ward.

tit.cmt: 小タイトル用に変更しました。

sen.j: （至竹田駅 (京都府)）← 鞍馬口駅※ - 北大路駅 - 北山駅 (京都府) →（至国際会館駅）
sen.e: (toward Takeda Station (Kyoto Prefecture) ← Kuramaguchi Station* - Kitaoji Station - Kitayama Station (Kyoto Prefecture) => (toward Kokusai Kaikan Station)

sen.j: ※鞍馬口駅は京都市上京区との境界にある。
sen.e: *Kuramaguchi Station is on the border with Kamigyo Ward Kyoto City.

sen.j: その他
北区の担当集配郵便局は以下の通りである。
sen.e: Competent post office in Kita Ward is as follows.
Competent post office in Kita Ward is as follows.
Competent post office in Kita Ward is as follows.

sen.j: 京都北郵便局 - 603-xxxx、601-01xx
sen.e: Kyoto-kita Post Office : ZIP Codes 603-xxxx and 601-01xx
